data.title: Generated by Ancestral Quest
data.text:
(1) "La Fayette," Vol. III, No. 2, p.1. Fayette Co., PA Deed Abstracts, Book A, p.50.

(2) "Fayette Co., PA Wills," p.225. FHL #861,065.

(3) Fayette Co., PA Will Bk 1, p.751-752, transcribed by Sandy Davison Bressler, Sacramento, CA. E-mail: [email protected].

(4) Lancaster Co., PA Will Bk J, p.36. FHL #21,358.

(5) Cecil Co., MD Land Records No. 13 1772-1774, p.197-202. FHL #13,826.

(6) Cecil Co., MD Land Records No. 14 1774-1779, p.17-19. FHL #13,827.

(7) Lancaster Co., PA Deeds, Bk P 1769-1773, p.395. FHL #21,386.

(8) Lancaster Co., PA Deed Bk T 1775-1782, p.77. FHL #21,388.

(9) Lancaster Co., PA Deed Bk S, p.592 1775-1778. FHL #21,388.

(10) Sandy Davison Bressler, Sacramento, CA. E-mail: [email protected] (2009). Cites: (a) Cecil Co., MD land record.

Birth: (4) Youngest s/o Samuel DAVISON.

Marriage to Mary __: (9) (2,3a) Named wife Mary in his will.

Death: (2) Will dtd 2 Aug 1822, Fayette Co., PA. (3) Will dtd 15 Jun 1822, proved 22 Aug 1822, Fayette Co., PA.
